message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a steal at $13,500. I think it will be very valuable to you, and this is a very competitive price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to pay a bit more than that, but I'd like to get closer to the price I'm comfortable with.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly worth more. How about we meet in the middle at $11,250?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet in the middle at $9,625?
